name: Zhu Lin

roles_in_work.title: The Adventures of the opera singers = Li yuan chuan qi
Meet again after 20 years = Er shi nian hou zai xiang hui

biography: Zhu Lin (born 1952) is a Chinese film actress. In 1978, Zhu graduated from Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences. Then she passed the examination of Beijing Film Academy. Her most famous role is the Queen of the Women's Kingdom in 1986 TV-series Journey To The West. In 1987, Zhu Lin won the Golden Eagle Award for Best Leading Actress for Triumph In The Midnight. She then became a popular leading actress in Chinese TV series. She is currently a member of the China Film Association, China Film Performance Art Academy and China Association for Promoting Democracy.
